reviews.review:
this game is amazing! i play this game alot, and i never get bored! its a great sequel to 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐥, the first game before portal 2, i love making 𝐁𝐄𝐄𝟐 chambers, its so good! the story is super good! i love,love,love this game! with its characters, chambers, and multiplayer! and the community is still uploading today! i rate this game 10/10! i recommend alot of people to play this!



after they have played portal!
Valla acayip bir zeka istiyor o ise çogumuzda yok. Onun dısında güzel ve biraz zor kafa karıştırıcı :P

''Bilim için...Seni CANAVAR.''

Hikaye bakımından önce Portal'ın ilk oyununu bitirin, sonra bunu. 
Tek kişilik modda hikaye var. Steam atölyesinden test odası indirip de oynayabiliyorsunuz.
2 kişilik modda adı üstünde arkadaşınızla beraber testleri geçiyorsunuz.

Hikayesi , karakterleri , müzikler , testler ve finali. EFSANEYDİ.
Portal'ın hiçbir serisinde hayal kırıklığına uğramadım. Portal 2 de zaten Portal serisinde favorim. 
Glados'un sesine hastayım zaten.
Ve gerçekten yaratıcı bir oyun. Testleri çözme, Portal Gun, robotlar, Glados , Aperture Science'ın derinleri... 
 
İşin güzeli testler beyin yakmadı bende açıkçası, sakin kafayla oynayın rahat rahat yaparsınız. Bulmacalar orta düzey. Zaten ilk oyunu oynayan 2. de çok zorluk çekmez. Ekstra birkaç şey eklenmiş, onlara da hemen adapte olursunuz zaten. 

Finaldeki şarkı mükemmel, söylemeden geçemeyeceğim.

Oyun gibi oyun. Alın bitirin.
сool
Best puzzle game I have ever played. 9/10

This certainly does not contain the heart-pounding action of Valve's other titles, yet it is quite the intellectually challenging experience in that it requires a lot of thinking. The humor is good and the puzzles unique and interesting, changing up locations so that it does no get too stale. However, sometimes the loactions and music overstay their welcome a bit. In any case, this is overall a good game that'd make a great addition to your library.

j'y avais joué à sa sortie y'a un moment et j'avais trouvé que ce jeu était une pure claque , un alien dans l'univers du jeu vidéo,je m'attendais à ce qu'il ait pris un coup de vieux depuis le temps, mais non c'est toujours aussi fun et beau ... en plus maintenant y'a des mods cools et des maps de communauté , par contre j'ai jamais testé la coop qui doit être vraiment carton.
10/10 pls play this, even if it is not your kinda game. Masterpiece.
코옵은 처음에 협동으로 시작합니다. 그러나 스테이지를 깰 수록 '내가 업었네? 열심히 해라ㅎㅎ'는 놀림부터 레이저로 지지기, 발밑에 갑자기 포탈 만들어서 이동시키기,  다리 만든 포탈 없애서 자살시키기 등등 서로에 대한 방해가 난무하게됩니다.

I've played through this game a total of three times, and each time I find it fun to search for achievements and easter eggs. Definelty worth your time, 40 hours can easily be put into it. Great story, great gameplay, interesting puzzles.

very positive

Portal 2's a great example of a sequel done really well. It takes the basic concept of the first game and totally revamps it with new puzzles, areas, lore and characters. The humor is also super well done, from Glados and Wheatleys banter to even the few lines muttered by the turrets. Theres a lot of love and care put into this game and its plain to see. Not only that its got both a single player and co-op campaign. Definitely get this if youre even slightly interested, its a classic.

Just as amazing as it was back in 2011. A fantastic story with a fun co op mode and not to mention the thousands of tests (puzzles) players have made not to mention you can create your own tests, making replay value almost infinite.

A Fantastic game that i can safely say will age very well with time
Love Portal 2, great game! The RP is hilarious and the puzzle get kinda hard, gonna sad when it's completed :(

One of Valve's finest, if not the finest. Portal 2 did everything its predecessor did but better. Valve is known for its incredible and engaging story-telling in their games and this is a perfect example of it. If you never have gotten into this series, you are seriously missing out. If you are a lover of puzzles and invigorating narrative, this is a must have. This game is one of my favorites of all time and i hope Valve can somehow through together a third installment in this series.

Portal 2 is great
It has a great sense of humour and its overall really beautiful for a game this old.
The puzzle designs are really good too and the story is also surprisingly nice.
This is one of those games that is just a must have for any steam library.

Jogo com uma jogabilidade simples, ficou mais desafiante que o primeiro portal, os gráficos são bons para um jogo de 2011 (não vou falar mt disso pois ja é 2018), a estória é fantástica, não precisa de um pc potente para rodar o game , se acabar o modo estória você ainda tem milhares de níveis na workshop feitas por fãs e ainda pode criar seu próprio nível, e têm o multyplayer online para pôder jogar com seus amigos e o local.
The best 3D logic games that I every played. And still not boring and good story.

wish i had a portal gun :(

Reviewing Portal 2 in 2018 is a wonderfully astounding thing to do, would recommend to play again.  I feel as if there should be a update such as the Half-Life update.
Lets go over stats of Portal 2 in 2018
Pros
1. The graphics hold up and it is very easy to run with great optimization.
2. Story line matches up woth newer games.
3. MUSIC IS STILL AMAZING

Cons
1. While the fanbase may not be dying it seems as if community maps are either going down in quality or are less fun to make.
Game has a very weird bug. Have no audio and whenever i wish to change audio settings, the game freezes. Preventing me from even trying to end the process in the task manager as the overlay is buggy.

Divertido, porém se torna sem graça de vc for procurar a historia do jogo. 
Mas pela mecânica , preço, qualidade geral do jogo, acho q vale a pena.
This is genuinely my favourite game ever. None will ever top it. If you haven't already bought it, do it NOW. It is a bargain at ANY (and I mean any) price.

After your previous adventure looking for cake, you now want to escape the cake factory place! Using the same gun that spawns portals to hell and back, you adventure through the same cake factory, with a little ball that f***s it all up, turning the caretaker into a potato. You fall into a ditch where you gotta go back to the cake factory and kill the spastic little f*** who ruined it all and send him to space. Once you beat the campaign, you can play multiplayer! Grab Fat B**tard the robot or his brother Hungry Child and use the portals through hell to beat YET ANOTHER CAMPAIGN (or just download some workshop maps)! If this game isn't fun, then nothing is!
Made me think super 8 was going to be a cool game not some crappy movie.
Une perle bien connue et reconnue par les joueurs du monde entier, un jeu où on ne s'ennuie pas et où le tryhard est le maître mot!

Quek joie de retrouver GLADOS, ainsi que de nouveaux personnages, dans ces salles de test devenu à l'abandon. Les répliques de notre compagne robotique sont aussi hilarante que dans le premier opus, voire plus! Bien que le mode solo soit encore court, l'intrigue, les rebondissements et le renouvellement des capacités (gel répulsif, attractif....) augmentent encore plus l'univers présenté précédement. À acheter en duo pack immédiatement :)

I played Portal 1 a gazillion years ago, and totally forgot that this game existed till a few weeks back after building my gaming system.

Needless to say, this game is a HUGE improvement and sheer number of levels is awesome!!

Si il y a un jeu que je vous conseille fortement , c'est Portal 2 ! Pourquoi ? Parce que il y a une histoire assez sympa ou il faut jouer sérieux mais surtout , le jeu peut être "rageant" par certains moments. Si Valve doit sortir un jeu , c'est Portal 3 car il y aurait la suite de l'histoire dans Portal 2. Je parle pas du mode multijoueur qui est très bien. Seul hic , on peut jouer qu'à 2. Si vous vous faites chier , n'hésitez pas à prendre ce jeu. Le temps passera vite. ^^
One of the top games of all time, just play it.

Portal 2 is my favorite game of all time, beating out Breath of The Wild by a narrow margin. If any person is harboring doubts about buying this game, stop thinking and just buy it. I have never and will never regret the purchase of this classic game.

[h1]Portal 2[/h1]

* História: 8/10
* Jogabilidade: 10/10
* Dificuldade: 8/10
* Visuais: 7/10
* Direção de arte: 9/10
* Trilha sonora: 7/10
* Design sonoro: 8/10
* Longevidade: 9/10

OVERALL: 9/10

Valve редко выпускает свои проекты но если и выпускает то действительно годные (дота исключение) конечно хорошо что они продвигают киберспорт но сюжетные игры у них получаются отличные, тем более на пк редко выходят хорошие проекты сплошные выживалки и королевские битвы, приелось и люди это жрут. Я думаю каждая студия если захочет она сможет выпустить нормальную сюжетную игру и у Valve со своей Portal 2 это получилось просто идеально, для меня эта игра как фильм и хочется раз за разом проходить её но увы приелась.
P.S. Как говорят многие хочется стереть память чтобы пройти это ещё раз.

10/10
1から続けてプレイ。時間的な制約がほとんどないので、ゆっくり考えて答えを出せるのが良いです。あと個人的には翻訳がとても好みでした。みんなかわいい…。

Story. Absolutely delightful humor and background. Characters, though few, are charming. The style of story-telling is iconic.
Gameplay. Simple mechanics that interplay perfectly to add a lot of depth that remains uncomplicated. The puzzles are intuitive but this is definitely not a walking simulator. 
Presentation. This game looks and sounds fantastic. The setting is fun and the game has moments that are breathtaking.

I played through the game in about 6 hours but there is a LOT more content available through community made mods and co-op modes.
